venue.name: Parking lot across from Regent Theater

item.description:
I thought it might be fun to have a recurring, slightly more demanding ride along the Minuteman for people who want to get out after work, do a moderate workout, and, if interested, have a quick dinner together afterwards in Arlington Center.

This ride will start on the Minuteman Bike Trail in Arlington Center. We'll ride to Bedford and back to Arlington without stopping (except at crossroads), maintaining an average pace of 13 - 15 mph (depending on bike trail traffic). Total distance should be somewhere around 16 miles. The ride should take about 1.25 hours.

There is a public parking lot off of Medford Street in Arlington Center. Parking is free there from 6PM on. We'll meet in this lot at 6:45PM.

Helmets and water recommended.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the public parking lot across from the Regent Theater at 6:45PM.
item.name: Thursday Night Minuteman Ride: Arlington to Bedford and Back
